Content: Keep on crashing with MIUI 9.02.0 Xiaomi version, pl resolve
This app is amazing! I love it! No ads, no lag and no crash! I prefer you download it, and give it ☆☆☆☆☆!!!!! I also got a greetings note!!
Easy to use. Stable and doesn't crash. Perfect for my needs.

This is hands down the smoothest app of its kind in the store. It works EXACTLY how I would of made it if I had created it. Just wish there was a midnight black theme option. Edit: Thanks dev, however the play store keeps crashing on me. I can't use it to update your app or any other.

Fantastic!! Very fast! Has never crashed once! The many unique ways to sort and group are very helpful in different situations! The interface is very well designed and the multiple word search functionality works perfectly! Great job devs!
